name: Cosmos Arena
description:
Cosmos Arena is a 4-player couch co-op platformer that takes place on a distant planet. The players are intergalactic park rangers sent on a mission to protect the planet's native species from invasive high-tech intruders. 

This game is in active development! If you don't like playing games with bugs, please wait for our full release in 2019  :)

This game is best played with 2-4 players. Each player needs an XBox controller. 

Your contribution is greatly appreciated and will help fund the rest of our development. We also welcome your feedback. 

Thanks for playing!
